column1: Thanks Mike -- it's great to be here. Almost pulled a Kingy at the weekend so it was a close one to get in for this.
Cheers Mike. Let's hope this goes better than Corporate Games!
Thank you Mike. Looking forward to getting some ballers picked.
Cheers Mike. This game could be the difference-maker for Business 5s sharpness.
Thanks Mike. Let's hope we can pick teams which even out the xWallbangs.
